name: Options_addOptionGroupTest
description: Unit tests for adding OptionGroup to Options with required and non-required groups.

test_cases.name: testAddOptionGroupWithRequiredGroup
test_cases.description: Tests adding a required OptionGroup to Options and verifies the group is marked as required and options are not individually required.

test_cases.name: testAddOptionGroupWithNonRequiredGroup
test_cases.description: Tests adding a non-required OptionGroup to Options and verifies the group is not marked as required and options are not individually required.
